thread.title: AR Rahman is cultural ambassador of Seychelles
thread.title_full: AR Rahman is cultural ambassador of Seychelles - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: AR Rahman is cultural ambassador of Seychelles
text:
Oscar-winning music composer AR Rahman has added yet another feather to his cap. The musician has been appointed as the cultural ambassador of Seychelles. The composer received a certificate that stated, "The Seychelles Ministry of Tourism and Culture proudly names AR Rahman Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles in appreciation for the invaluable services contributed to enhance Seychelles's Art and Cultural development."
The composer posted a picture of the certificate on his micro-blogging page," With love and regards to the people and government of Seychelles."
